message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but $110 is still a bit above my budget.  I'd be willing to pay $105 for it. What do you think?

Hi Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $108. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value you'll get from it!
